```{python}
experiments_of_interest = None
if from_cache:
    experiment_data = pd.read_csv('../rsp-data/h1_2020_08_24T21_04_42/h1_2020_08_24T21_04_42_baseline_2020_09_17T17_08_13_bis.csv')
else:
    experiment_base_directory = '../rsp-data/h1_2020_08_24T21_04_42/h1_2020_08_24T21_04_42_baseline_2020_09_17T17_08_13'
    experiment_results_list = load_and_expand_experiment_results_from_data_folder(
        experiment_data_folder_name=f'{experiment_base_directory}/{EXPERIMENT_DATA_SUBDIRECTORY_NAME}',
        experiment_ids=experiments_of_interest,
        nonify_problem_and_results=True
    )
    experiment_data: pd.DataFrame = convert_list_of_experiment_results_analysis_to_data_frame(experiment_results_list)
    experiment_data.to_csv('../rsp-data/h1_2020_08_24T21_04_42/h1_2020_08_24T21_04_42_baseline_2020_09_17T17_08_13_bis.csv')


display(experiment_data)
```

```{python}
axis_of_interest = 'n_agents'
columns_of_interest = ['time_full','time_full_after_malfunction','time_delta_perfect_after_malfunction']
```

### Filter data depending on full rescheduling time (>10s and within 97% percentile)

```{python}
experiment_data_filtered = experiment_data[(experiment_data['solver_statistics_times_total_full_after_malfunction'] > 10) & (experiment_data['solver_statistics_times_total_full_after_malfunction'] <=experiment_data['solver_statistics_times_total_full_after_malfunction'].quantile(.97))]

```

```{python}
print(f"removed {len(experiment_data)-len(experiment_data_filtered)}/{len(experiment_data)} rows")
```

### Inspect experiment parameters

```{python}
plot_computational_times(
    experiment_data=experiment_data_filtered,
    axis_of_interest='experiment_id',
    columns_of_interest=['n_agents', 'infra_id', 'schedule_id', 'size', 'earliest_malfunction', 'malfunction_duration', 'malfunction_agend_id'],
    title='Number of agents',
    y_axis_title= "[-]",
    color_offset=1
)
```

### Visualize Online Prediction Quality

```{python}
axis_of_interest = 'experiment_id'
columns_of_interest = ['changed_agents_percentage_full_after_malfunction', 'online_predicted_changed_agents_percentage','online_predicted_changed_agents_false_positives_percentage', 'online_predicted_changed_agents_false_negatives_percentage']

plot_computational_times(experiment_data=experiment_data_filtered,
                         axis_of_interest=axis_of_interest,
                         columns_of_interest=columns_of_interest,
                         title='Online Prediction Quality Percentage',
                         color_offset=1,
                         y_axis_title='Fraction [-]'
                        )
columns_of_interest = ['n_agents', 'changed_agents_full_after_malfunction', 'online_predicted_changed_agents','online_predicted_changed_agents_false_positives', 'online_predicted_changed_agents_false_negatives']

plot_computational_times(experiment_data=experiment_data_filtered,
                         axis_of_interest=axis_of_interest,
                         columns_of_interest=columns_of_interest,
                         title='Online Prediction Quality Absolute Numbers',
                             y_axis_title='Number [-]'
                        )
```

```{python}
from rsp.utils.data_types import after_malfunction_scopes
# Choices represent the size of the solution space (how many routing alternatives, how many potential resource conflicts?
# Conflicts represent the number of decisions
for prefix in ['solver_statistics_conflicts', 'solver_statistics_choices', 'nb_resource_conflicts']:
    columns_of_interest =[ f'{prefix}_{scope}' for scope in after_malfunction_scopes ]
    plot_computational_times(experiment_data=experiment_data_filtered,
                             axis_of_interest=axis_of_interest,
                             columns_of_interest=columns_of_interest,
                             title=f'{prefix} per',
                             y_axis_title=f'{prefix} [-]'
                            )
```
